## KeÅŸifsel Veri Analizi (Exploratory Data Analysis)

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

# Veriyi oku (uyarÄ±larÄ± bastÄ±r)
df <- suppressMessages(read_excel("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/orman_yanginlari1988_2023.xlsx"))

# SayÄ±sal kolonlarÄ± temizle + dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r (uyarÄ±larÄ± bastÄ±r)
df$yil <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df$yil))
df$adet <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9.]", "", df$adet)))
df$hektar <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9.]", "", df$hektar)))

    labs(title = "YÄ±llara GÃ¶re Orman YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ±",
         x = "YÄ±l", y = "YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ± (adet)") +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))
)

# Grafik 2: Yanan Alan (DÃœZENLENDÄ°: Y ekseni okunaklÄ±)

  ggplot(df, aes(x = yil, y = hektar)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 1.2, color = "darkgreen") +
    geom_point(color = "forestgreen") +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(df$yil), max(df$yil), by = 1)) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = label_comma()) +
    labs(title = "YÄ±llara GÃ¶re Yanan Alan (Hektar)",
         x = "YÄ±l", y = "Alan") +

    labs(title = "YangÄ±n Nedenlerine GÃ¶re YÄ±llÄ±k DaÄŸÄ±lÄ±m",
         x = "YÄ±l", y = "YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ±") +
    theme_minimal() +

)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(stringi)

# TÃ¼rkÃ§e karakter dÃ¼zeltme fonksiyonu
duzelt <- function(x) {
  tolower(stri_trans_general(x, "Latin-ASCII"))
}

# 1. Ä°l koordinat verisini yÃ¼kle (il.csv dosyan)
koord <- read_csv("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/il.csv") |>
  mutate(il_adi = duzelt(il_adi)) |>
  select(sehir = il_adi, lat, lon)

# 2. 2023 yÄ±lÄ± yangÄ±n verisini oku ve temizle
iller <- read_excel("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/iller_2023.xlsx") |>
  filter(sehir != "TÃ¼rkiye") |>
  mutate(
    sehir = duzelt(sehir),
    adet = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", adet)),
    hektar = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", hektar))
  )

# 3. Koordinatlar ile yangÄ±n verisini birleÅŸtir

      "<b>", toupper(sehir), "</b><br>",
      "YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ±: ", adet, "<br>",
      "Yanan Alan: ", hektar, " ha"
    )
  )
```
